title: Ángel Leyes
text:
Ángel Leonides Leyes (22 April 1930 in <a href="Talita">Talita</a>, <a href="San%20Luis%20Province">San Luis Province</a> – 24 June 1996 in Buenos Aires) was an Argentine <a href="boxing">boxer</a> who was Latin American <a href="featherweight">featherweight</a> champion in 1948 and 1952. He also wins Argentine <a href="featherweight">featherweight</a> championship in 1948, 1949 and two times in 1952. He participated in the <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Helsinki">Helsinki</a>, <a href="Finland">Finland</a>.
He was one of the most popular Argentine boxers in the early fifties in Argentina.
